LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.ascetic_has_awful_bedroom: My bedroom is just how I want it to be. Very humble and simple.
My bedroom is just how I want it to be. Very humble and simple.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.ascetic_has_mediocre_bedr: My bedroom is very humble and simple. I like it.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.ascetic_has_impressive_be: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.brawler_has_ranged: I hate shooting from a distance. I want to get up close and personal!
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.constraining_clothe: I'm a nudist but I have to wear these clothes. It's not unbearable - but I still feel constrained and uncomfortable.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.greedy_for_impressive_bedr: I'm greedy. I want a really impressive bedroom.
I'm greedy. My room is pathetic! I want a really impressive bedroom.
I'm greedy. My room isn't nearly good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
I'm greedy. My room isn't good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
I'm greedy. My room isn't quite good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.happily_nude.label: happily nude
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.happily_nude.descriptio: I'm nude and loving it! I feel so free and unconstrained and in touch with my surroundings!
LanguageData.Jealous.stages.jealous_of_s_bedroom.desc: I need to have the best one!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.masochist_in_minor_: Ow... Heh heh heh... I could get used to this!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.masochist_in_seriou: Ughhh... It hurts, but I love it! Keep it coming!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.masochist_in_intens: Ouch... I think something's broken... But what an exquisite feeling!
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheDay.stages.night_owl_in: I don't like working during the day.
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheNight.stages.night_owl_: I feel much better at night.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.body_modder_ple: This artificial enhancement is cool. I want more.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.body_modder_qui: Two artificial enhancements are better than one. I wish I had more.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.body_modder_del: Three artificial enhancements, and my weak human flesh is receding. But I still want more machine power.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.body_modder_enc: Four artificial enhancements and I am becoming more than human. But there's still some flesh that needs replacing.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.body_modder_ove: Five artificial enhancements! How could an enhanced being like me ever feel sad?
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.body_mod: Flesh is so limiting. I wish I had some kind of artificial body part.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.body_purist_s: I hate having this unnatural thing attached to me. It feels so filthy!
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.body_purist_d: Two artificial enhancements are sullying my natural, pure body. It makes me sick to think of it.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.body_purist_v: Three artificial enhancements violate my body's pure flesh. I shudder when I think of it... and these objects shudder with me.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.body_purist_h: I have four artificial enhancements; it's like I'm becoming a robot. What a horrifying sensation.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.body_purist_n: Five artificial enhancements... Is there anything left of me? Or am I just a robot that thinks it's human?
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.I_have_become: I have become what I hate
I asked for the exact opposite of this!
LanguageData.PyromaniacHappy.stages.pyromaniac_has_in: It makes me think of flame and fire. I'm so happy.
LanguageData.PyromaniacNearFire.stages.beautiful_fire: The sinuous flame dances, warm like love, bright like freedom, all-consuming.
LanguageData.UndergrounderIndoors.stages.undergrounde: I like working or simply being indoors.
LanguageData.UndergrounderOutdoors.stages.underground: I don't like being outside. I want to get back to the underground.
LanguageData.UndergrounderUnderground.stages.undergro: I love working or simply being in the underground.
